bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with du li 毒痢 , poison free-flux illness. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 20: 治下焦熱 毒痢，魚腦雜痢赤血，臍下小腹絞痛不可忍，欲痢不出方 , “Recipe to cure lower burner heat poison free-flux illness , free-flux illness interspersed with fish brain and red blood, with unbearable twisting pain below one’s navel in the lower abdomen, and also if there is an urge to [defecate as if suffering from a] free-flux illness with eventually no discharge at all”.
